TopicTitle: Game stuttered an crashed after leaving kerbins soi.

Articles.Content:
In a recent mission my game lagged and crashed. Note I was in a Kerbin escape trajectory. Other things to note is that my solar orbit would transfer to Jool and I had a maneuver mode on my solar trajectory. Similar lag and crashed happened when I turned the comic patch draw limit too high. So it may have been me putting too much strain on the patched comics system however I doubt that was the case because I have loaded more conics in 1.8. Also this changing soi lag did not happen in the Rosetta mission. Also 1.10 appears to be laggier than 1.8 for me.

Edited July 4, 2020 by catloaf
Ok I think this may be a ram based issue.
